title: Digital Green Certificate
description: Proof of vaccination, test results or recovery according to EU eHN, version 1.0, including certificate metadata; According to 1) REGULATION OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL on a framework for the issuance, verification and acceptance of interoperable certificates on vaccination, testing and recovery to facilitate free movement during the COVID-19 pandemic (Digital Green Certificate) - https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=CELEX%3A52021PC0130 2) Document "Value Sets for the digital green certificate as stated in the Annex ...", abbr. "VS-2021-04-14" - https://webgate.ec.europa.eu/fpfis/wikis/x/05PuKg 3) Guidelines on verifiable vaccination certificates - basic interoperability elements - Release 2 - 2021-03-12, abbr. "guidelines"

v.title: Schema version
v.description: Version of the schema, according to Semantic versioning (ISO, https://semver.org/ version 2.0.0 or newer) (viz. guidelines)

dgcid.title: Identifier
dgcid.description: Unique identifier of the DGC (initially called UVCI (V for vaccination), later renamed to DGCI), format and composizion viz. guidelines

gn.title: Given name
gn.description: The given name(s) of the person addressed in the certificate

fn.title: Family name
fn.description: The family name(s) of the person addressed in the certificate

gnt.title: Given name (transliterated)
gnt.description: The given name(s) of the person addressed in the certificate transliterated into the OCR-B Characters from ISO 1073-2 according to the ICAO Doc 9303 part 3.

fnt.title: Family name (transliterated)
fnt.description: The family name(s) of the person addressed in the certificate transliterated into the OCR-B Characters from ISO 1073-2 according to the ICAO Doc 9303 part 3.

id.title: Person identifiers
id.description: Identifiers of the vaccinated person, according to the policies applicable in each country

t.title: Identifier type
t.description: The type of identifier (viz. VS-2021-04-08) PP = Passport Number NN = National Person Identifier CZ = Citizenship Card Number HC = Health Card number NI = National Unique Individual Identifier MB = Member Number NH = National Helth Plan Identifier

c.title: Country
c.description: Issuing country (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code) of identifier

dob.title: Date of birth
dob.description: Mandatory if no Person identifier is provided

vap.title: Vaccine/prophylaxis
vap.description: Generic description of the vaccine/prophylaxis or its component(s), (viz. VS-2021-04-14)

mep.title: Vaccine medicinal product
mep.description: Code of the medicinal product (viz. VS-2021-04-14)

aut.title: Vaccine marketing authorization holder or Vaccine manufacturer
aut.description: Code as defined in EMA SPOR - Organisations Management System (viz. VS-2021-04-14)

seq.title: Dose sequence number
seq.description: Number of dose administered in a cycle  (viz. VS-2021-04-14)

tot.title: Total number of doses
tot.description: Number of expected doses for a complete cycle (specific for a person at the time of administration) (viz. VS-2021-04-14)

dat.title: Date of vaccination
dat.description: The date of the vaccination event

cou.title: Country
cou.description: Country (member state) of vaccination (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 Country Code) (viz. VS-2021-04-14)

lot.title: Batch/lot number
lot.description: A distinctive combination of numbers and/or letters which specifically identifies a batch, optional

adm.title: Administering centre
adm.description: Name/code of administering centre or a health authority responsible for the vaccination event, optional

typ.title: Type of test
typ.description: Code of the type of test that was conducted

tma.title: Manufacturer and test name
tma.description: Manufacturer and commercial name of the test used (optional for NAAT test) (viz. VS-2021-04-14)

ori.title: Sample origin
ori.description: Origin of sample that was taken (e.g. nasopharyngeal swab, oropharyngeal swab etc.) (viz. VS-2021-04-14) optional

dts.title: Date and time sample
dts.description: Date and time when the sample for the test was collected (seconds since epoch)

dtr.title: Date and time test result
dtr.description: Date and time when the test result was produced (seconds since epoch)

res.title: Result of test
res.description: Result of the test according to SNOMED CT (viz. VS-2021-04-14)

fac.title: Testing centre or facility
fac.description: Name/code of testing centre, facility or a health authority responsible for the testing event.

cou.title: Country
cou.description: Country (member state) of test (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 Country Code)

dis.title: Disease
dis.description: Disease or agent the citizen has recovered from

dat.title: Date of first positive test result
dat.description: The date when the sample for the test was collected that led to a positive test result

cou.title: Country of test
cou.description: Country (member state) in which the first positive test was performed (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 Country Code)
